level.heading: Criminal action.
level.text: A person who willfully violates § 48-702(1) is guilty of a misdemeanor, and, upon conviction, shall be fined not more than $5,000 for the first offense or $10,000 for the second or subsequent offense, imprisoned for not more than one year, or both. Each day that a violation continues is a separate violation under this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-137, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-701.
